snowflake:position-deletes:v2.notes: Snowflake uses copy-on-write exclusively; does not support position deletes

snowflake:position-deletes:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:equality-deletes:v2.notes: Snowflake uses copy-on-write exclusively; does not support equality deletes

snowflake:equality-deletes:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:merge-on-read:v2.notes: Snowflake uses copy-on-write exclusively; merge-on-read is not supported

snowflake:merge-on-read:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:copy-on-write:v2.notes: Snowflake uses copy-on-write as its exclusive write strategy for Iceberg tables

snowflake:copy-on-write:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:schema-evolution:v2.notes: Schema evolution supported for Snowflake-managed Iceberg tables

snowflake:schema-evolution:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:column-default-values:v2.notes: Column default values are a V3 feature

snowflake:column-default-values:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:nanosecond-timestamps:v2.notes: Nanosecond timestamps are a V3 feature

snowflake:nanosecond-timestamps:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:hidden-partitioning:v2.notes: Snowflake supports partitioning via clustering keys but does not expose all Iceberg partition transforms
caveats: Uses Snowflake clustering rather than native Iceberg partition transforms

snowflake:hidden-partitioning:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:partition-evolution:v2.notes: Limited partition evolution; Snowflake manages clustering internally
caveats: Partition evolution is managed through Snowflake clustering, not native Iceberg partition evolution

snowflake:partition-evolution:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:multi-arg-transforms:v2.notes: Multi-argument transforms are a V3 feature

snowflake:multi-arg-transforms:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:time-travel:v2.notes: Time travel supported for Snowflake-managed Iceberg tables

snowflake:time-travel:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:table-maintenance:v2.notes: Snowflake automatically handles compaction and optimization for managed Iceberg tables

snowflake:table-maintenance:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:branching-tagging:v2.notes: Snowflake does not support Iceberg branching and tagging

snowflake:branching-tagging:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:read-support:v2.notes: Full read support for Iceberg tables

snowflake:read-support:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:write-insert:v2.notes: INSERT INTO supported for Snowflake-managed Iceberg tables

snowflake:write-insert:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:write-merge-update-delete:v2.notes: MERGE, UPDATE, DELETE supported for Snowflake-managed Iceberg tables using copy-on-write

snowflake:write-merge-update-delete:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:catalog-integration:v2.notes: Snowflake supports its own catalog, Snowflake Open Catalog (Polaris), and external catalogs

snowflake:catalog-integration:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:hive-metastore:v2.notes: Snowflake does not support Hive Metastore for Iceberg

snowflake:hive-metastore:v3.notes: Snowflake does not support Hive Metastore for Iceberg

snowflake:aws-glue-catalog:v2.notes: Snowflake can read Iceberg tables registered in AWS Glue Catalog as external tables

snowflake:aws-glue-catalog:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:rest-catalog:v2.notes: Snowflake supports REST Catalog for external Iceberg table access

snowflake:rest-catalog:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:nessie:v2.notes: Snowflake does not support Nessie catalog

snowflake:nessie:v3.notes: Snowflake does not support Nessie catalog

snowflake:polaris:v2.notes: Snowflake Open Catalog is built on Polaris; native integration

snowflake:polaris:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:unity-catalog:v2.notes: Snowflake can access Unity Catalog Iceberg tables via REST Catalog API
caveats: Read-only access to Unity Catalog managed tables

snowflake:unity-catalog:v3.notes: Snowflake has not yet announced Iceberg V3 support
caveats: Snowflake V3 support not yet announced

snowflake:hadoop-catalog:v2.notes: Snowflake does not support Hadoop catalog

snowflake:hadoop-catalog:v3.notes: Snowflake does not support Hadoop catalog

snowflake:jdbc-catalog:v2.notes: Snowflake does not support JDBC catalog

snowflake:jdbc-catalog:v3.notes: Snowflake does not support JDBC catalog
